column2: All right, Commander, our goal is to track down the convoy...
column3: All right, Commander, our goal is to track down the convoy...

column2: ...so let's scout out the target area. When we've found the convoy, we stop it from reaching its destination.
column3: ...so let's scout out the target area. When we've found the convoy, we stop it from reaching its destination.

column2: Then we make our way to the evac zone.
column3: Then we make our way to the evac zone.

column2: Get to it, Commander.
column3: Get to it, Commander.

column2: Mission accomplished. The fire support vehicles have been neutralized.
column3: Mission accomplished. The fire support vehicles have been neutralized.

column2: Nothing more to do here Commander, lets go home.
column3: Nothing more to do here Commander, lets go home.

column2: The target vehicles should be just ahead. Be careful commander, who knows what they're packing.
column3: The target vehicles should be just ahead. Be careful commander, who knows what they're packing.

column2: That's got it, primary target damaged. Keep on those ones.
column3: That's got it, primary target damaged. Keep on those ones.

column2: The guard units are dealt with; a wise move.
column3: The guard units are dealt with; a wise move.

column2: Warning, Commander! The target vehicles have begun to arrive at their destination; not much time left before they escape!
column3: Warning, Commander! The target vehicles have begun to arrive at their destination; not much time left before they escape!

column2: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
column3: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.

column2: The convoy is finished, now get what 'mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.

column2: We've got company!
column3: We've got company!

column2: Commander, the targets will probably be on the slow and squishy side. But the reason we're being asked to hit them in transit, outside entrenched positions, is because they pack a punch.

column3: According to these survey maps, you should be able to see the convoy's route from this location.

column2: Once you have eyes on them, destroy the vehicles. Any other units are at your discretion, but there shouldn't be much opposition.
column3: Once you have eyes on them, destroy the vehicles. Any other units are at your discretion, but there shouldn't be much opposition.

column2: Famous last words. Commander, when you're ready for pickup, I'll meet you at this LZ.

column2: Slightly more exciting than we were led to believe, but nothing we couldn't handle.

column3: This contract turned out to be slightly more exciting than we were led to believe.

column2: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.

column2: We maintain a very accurate registry of all military convoys on this planet. Recently, an analyst spotted something odd: a convoy that wasn't accounted for anywhere in our records. It's been regularly traveling along one of our standard logistical routes, and using our logistical comms, which is how it evaded detection for so long. Our signals intercepts tell us they're {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} drivers, so we have to assume they're smuggling right in our own backyard. We don't want to spook them with our own military comm chatter; we need an independent force to intercept and destroy them.
column3: We maintain a very accurate registry of all military convoys on this planet. Recently, an analyst spotted something odd: a convoy that wasn't accounted for anywhere in our records. It's been regularly traveling along one of our standard logistical routes, and using our logistical comms, which is how it evaded detection for so long. Our signals intercepts tell us they're {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} drivers, so we have to assume they're smuggling right in our own backyard. We don't want to spook them with our own military comm chatter; we need an independent force to intercept and destroy them.

column2: Two full lances? I'd call that a lot more opposition than we were led to believe.

column2: A routine orbital survey of {TGT_SYSTEM.name} picked up coded transmissions from the surface. Our intelligence experts believe these transmissions come from a well-hidden {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility in this supposedly uninhabited system. Needless to say, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} is not willing to tolerate secret military bases in this region. We need a mercenary company to intercept one of the supply caravans traveling to the secret base. Even if we can't find their facility, we can still starve them out.
column3: A routine orbital survey of {TGT_SYSTEM.name} picked up coded transmissions from the surface. Our intelligence experts believe these transmissions come from a well-hidden {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility in this supposedly uninhabited system. Needless to say, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} is not willing to tolerate secret military bases in this region. We need a mercenary company to intercept one of the supply caravans traveling to the secret base. Even if we can't find their facility, we can still starve them out.

column2: We're tracking a regular {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} logistical convoy through this area, and believe the convoy is carrying critical supplies for an unknown number of military units. We'd like you to destroy the convoy and any supplies it might be hauling. We have no information on what defenses the convoy is likely to have, so assume at least one lance escorting. If so, there is a bonus in it for you if you eliminate that escort lance.

column3: Then we make our way to the evac zone.

column2: Get to it, Commander.
column3: Get to it, Commander.

column2: Mission accomplished. The target mechs have been totaled
column3: Mission accomplished. The target mechs have been totaled

column2: Nothing more to do here Commander, lets go home.
column3: Nothing more to do here Commander, lets go home.

column2: The target mechs should be just ahead. Watch out for their escort too.
column3: The target mechs should be just ahead. Watch out for their escort too.

column2: That's got it, primary target damaged. Keep on those ones.
column3: That's got it, primary target damaged. Keep on those ones.

column2: The guard units are dealt with; a wise move.
column3: The guard units are dealt with; a wise move.

column2: Warning, Commander! The target mechs have begun to arrive at their destination; not much time left before they escape!
column3: Warning, Commander! The target mechs have begun to arrive at their destination; not much time left before they escape!

column2: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
column3: One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.

column2: The convoy is finished, now get what 'mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.
column3: The convoy is finished, now get what 'mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.

column2: We've got company!
column3: We've got company!

column2: Commander, from what I understand the mechs are being piloted by either rookies or support staff. They'll likely try to escape rather than battle. They will have an escort however.
column3: Commander, from what I understand the mechs are being piloted by either rookies or support staff. They'll likely try to escape rather than battle. They will have an escort however.

column2: A lance of newly manufactured {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} 'mechs is being moved overland from manufacturing facilities to a their garrison. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} would like these units destroyed before they enter military service.

column3: Witness Tampering

column2: Our employers are signaling that the convoy has entered the region. Time to move out.
column3: Our employers are signaling that the convoy has entered the region. Time to move out.

column2: Here's where we'll make contact with the targets. Once we start shooting, the convoy will probably make a break for it. Intercept them.
column3: Here's where we'll make contact with the targets. Once we start shooting, the convoy will probably make a break for it. Intercept them.

column2: Once they're dealt with, head to the evac zone for pickup, or clear out the convoy's guards. Your call.
column3: Once they're dealt with, head to the evac zone for pickup, or clear out the convoy's guards. Your call.

column2: Good luck, Commander.
column3: Good luck, Commander.

column2: Well done, Commander. Let's debrief back in orbit.
column3: Well done, Commander. Let's debrief back in orbit.

column2: That's a disappointing result, Commander.
column3: That's a disappointing result, Commander.

column2: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destory, Commander.

column2: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.
column3: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.

column2: Somehow we've let {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} get their hands on one of our less reliable suppliers. It only took them a few days to break her, and now she's ready to spill all kinds of secrets in court. That isn't in our best interests, and since you're talking to us, it's not in yours, either. We'd like to do a little bit of witness tampering, of the fatal variety. She's being transported to a secure facility by ground vehicle. We don't know which vehicle she'll be in, so just take them all out. If you help us send a message by wiping out all the escorts, there's a bonus in it for you.
column3: Somehow we've let {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} get their hands on one of our less reliable suppliers. We'd like to do a little bit of witness tampering, of the fatal variety. She's being transported to a secure facility by ground vehicle. We don't know which vehicle she'll be in, so just take them all out. If you help us send a message by wiping out all the escorts, there's a bonus in it for you.

column2: A team of {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} agents has obtained the schedule and manifest of a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy. This convoy's cargo is extremely valuable technological components. We want you to steal them for us. Stage an ambush of the convoy, destroy the vehicles, and we'll send in a recovery team to gather the cargo. There's a bonus if you secure the area and eliminate all the convoy guards.
column3: A team of {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} agents has obtained the schedule and manifest of a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy. This convoy's cargo is extremely valuable technological components. We want you to steal them for us. Stage an ambush of the convoy, destroy the vehicles, and we'll send in a recovery team to gather the cargo. There's a bonus if you secure the area and eliminate all the convoy guards.

column2: Rolling Metal
column3: Rolling Metal

column2: This is the area, Commander. The armored column should be just ahead.
column3: This is the area, Commander. The armored column should be just ahead.

column2: I'm not getting in range of that thing's guns, Commander. Move up to... here. You should be able to spot the target.
column3: I'm not getting in range of that thing's guns, Commander. Move up to... here. You should be able to spot the target.

column2: I'll be on station, boss. After you make some tank-sized holes in the terrain, I'll pick your lance up at this LZ.
column3: I'll be on station, boss. After you make some tank-sized holes in the terrain, I'll pick your lance up at this LZ.

column2: That's one fewer Schrek on the planet, Commander. Personally, I'm relieved.
column3: That's one fewer Schrek on the planet, Commander. Personally, I'm relieved.

column2: I don't know what happened down there, Commander. Let's debrief back in orbit.
column3: I don't know what happened down there, Commander. Let's debrief back in orbit.

column2: We have a lock on the target vehicles. They should be to your front. Engage and destory, Commander.

column2: That's got it, keep firing on those targets until they are neutralized.

column2: That's the last of the escorts, Commander. Focus fire on the convoy.
column3: That's the last of the escorts, Commander. Focus fire on the convoy.

column2: Boss, the column is about to leave the AO. If we lose them, we don't get paid.
column3: Boss, the column is about to leave the AO. If we lose them, we don't get paid.

column2: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.
column3: Enemy Reinforcements, get ready for contact.

column2: Don't underestimate the Schrek, Commander. It's tough as hell and carries three PPCs, and has the heat capacity to fire them non-stop.
column3: Don't underestimate the Schrek, Commander. It's tough as hell and carries three PPCs, and has the heat capacity to fire them non-stop.

column2: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

column2: Our sources on the planet have alerted us to a convoy of vehicles being transferred to an otherwise undefended military base. If we act quickly, we can destroy that convoy before it has a chance to reinforce the base. Normally we wouldn't be concerned about a simple vehicle convoy, but {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence operatives report that one of the vehicles is a fully operational Schrek PPC carrier. That's not a threat we can afford to ignore. We need you to eliminate that convoy before they make it to their base.
column3: Our sources on the planet have alerted us to a convoy of vehicles being transferred to an otherwise undefended military base. If we act quickly, we can destroy that convoy before it has a chance to reinforce the base. Normally we wouldn't be concerned about a simple vehicle convoy, but {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence operatives report that one of the vehicles is a fully operational Schrek PPC carrier. That's not a threat we can afford to ignore. We need you to eliminate that convoy before they make it to their base.
